title: The Christ Virus
description: The world's most deadly bioweapon lies hidden in the bowels of a secret government lab until a terrorist steals it with only objective: to cleanse the U.S. of infidels. With only precious hours until the government implements an apocalyptic solution, Dr. Jenny George must find the one man who is strangely immune to the deadly virus. But he has disappeared.
author: Dave Slade
